title: Lynda.com - Motion 3 Essential Training
description:
Motion 3 is part of the Final Cut Studio suite of applications by Apple <a href="
http://www.apple.com/finalcutstudio/overview.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.apple.com/finalcutstudio/overview.html</a>


Video Tutorial

Motion 3 - Essential Training
with: Ian Robinson


The real-time engine in Motion 3, a component of Apple's Final Cut Studio 2, gives motion graphics designers the freedom to continually experiment and adjust while they work. Ian Robinson explores how to get the most from this unique application, while also sharing his own essential motion graphics techniques. Along with teaching the fundamentals of video and audio work, he looks at Motion 3's new 3D tools in depth. Ian demonstrates the use of behaviors to create organic movement in particle systems and camera moves without keyframes. He also discusses effective integration with the other Final Cut Studio applications, and much more. Exercise files accompany the tutorial.


Topics include:

Introduction
Getting Started
Adding Assets to a Project
Working with Behaviors
Keyframing
Working with Text
Using Filters
Keying
Using Masks and Shapes
Working with Generators
Creating Particle Systems
Using Replicators
Understanding Paint
Working with Video
Working with Audio
Exporting
Final Cut Studio Integration
Conclusion


For more info: <a href=" http://movielibrary.lynda.com/html/modPage.asp?ID=588" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://movielibrary.lynda.com/html/modPage.asp?ID=588</a>

Hope you enjoy!
